lang-2a838c52-a622-46e7-991f-76c5d86f118: Consulting Company Amanat Advisory LLC. Keep in touch.
lang-de48119e-6e58-4638-9e52-b157c06d43d: Consulting Company Amanat Advisory offers a wide range of consulting services on Islamic Finance, including opening of Islamic Banking Windows, as well as, opening of Islamic non-banking financial organizations, Islamic Banks, transformation of traditional banks to Islamic banks. Also,  we provide training to the personnel on Islamic Finance and many other necessary for full operation within Islamic Financing Development.
lang-66a5276b-a9c3-4c30-a282-81e3e62b79c: Increasing number of Islamic Banking windows;
lang-23c845cb-d7b8-461b-97f8-9c0e9f70bb3: Increasing the number of fully Islamic Banks;
lang-38f9059b-308e-461c-b1cf-6575cd0482f: Focus on the development of IF education;
lang-64cf57cf-7fbc-4d45-ab78-ecc0ca8df0d: Solving Islamic Financing problems at the government level.;
lang-35e41beb-397e-4d59-b316-b260f5d7a57: Become a major hub for raising funds for the development of IF goals;
lang-a18ca12c-fb33-4701-a45f-026ff6403d3: Contribute to the development of the Islamic Principle of Finance in the territory of the Kyrgyz Republic and the CIS countries, by expanding the IPF in the financial sector. Become a reliable service provider by establishing long-term and mutually beneficial relationships with partners.
lang-68cc1fe1-68ea-4d18-943d-57bfeb401e5: Our services include a complete cycle of processes, from the formation of personnel to the delivery of the software in the shortest possible time. Our team consists of specialists and members of the Council for the Supervision of Islamic Financial Services, who have theoretical knowledge of Islamic principles of financing, as well as many years of practical experience in this field, both in Kyrgyzstan and abroad. For the present, we’ve made contracts with some local major banks and are consulting them on Islamic Financing implementation and software, representing their interest on different markets.
lang-29b886c8-b489-489f-b369-1bd6d040312: The main work of our company is to provide consulting support for the project for the implementation and launch of "Islamic banking" in banking and financial institutions. Islamic principles of financing are gaining great popularity, and at the moment we are actively negotiating with some banks. And we signed a contract with two of them to provide consulting services on Islamic Principles of finance. These are Bakai Bank and AKB Kyrgyzstan.
